definition[0]: to persuade someone to have sex with you, especially in a way that is attractive and not too direct
example[0]: The professor was sacked for seducing female students.
example[1]: Are you trying to seduce me?
definition[1]: to make someone want to do something by making it seem very attractive or interesting to them
example[2]: I was young and seduced by New York.
example[3]: Leaders are people who can seduce other people into sharing their dream.
explanation[0]: Seduce is often passive in this meaning
